entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 10:08 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 10:08 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
